trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for all manifest generation tasks.
trans-unit.target: Representerer basisklasse for alle manifest generering oppgaver.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateManifestBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateManifestBase"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Adds an assembly reference to the manifest, based on the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en samlingsreferansen til manifestfilen, basert på det angitte elementet.

trans-unit.source: The item from which to create an assembly reference to add to the manifest.
trans-unit.target: Element å opprette en samlingsreferansen å legge til i manifestet.

trans-unit.source: The assembly reference that was added to the manifest.
trans-unit.target: Samlingsreferansen som ble lagt til i manifestet.

trans-unit.source: Adds an assembly reference to the manifest, based on the specified item and the assembly reference type.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en samlingsreferansen til manifestfilen, basert på det angitte elementet og referansetypen samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The item from which to create an assembly reference to add to the manifest.
trans-unit.target: Element å opprette en samlingsreferansen å legge til i manifestet.

trans-unit.source: The assembly reference type.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen referansetype.

trans-unit.source: The assembly reference that was added to the manifest.
trans-unit.target: Samlingsreferansen som ble lagt til i manifestet.

trans-unit.source: Adds an entry point reference to the manifest, based on the specified item and the assembly reference type.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en oppføring punkt referanse til manifestfilen, basert på det angitte elementet og referansetypen samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The item from which to create the entry point reference to add to the manifest.
trans-unit.target: Elementet å opprette posten peke referanse til å legge til manifestet.

trans-unit.source: The entry point assembly reference type.
trans-unit.target: Inngangspunkt samlingen referansetype.

trans-unit.source: The entry point reference that was added to the manifest.
trans-unit.target: Oppføring, punkt referansen som ble lagt til i manifestet.

trans-unit.source: Adds a file reference to the manifest, based on the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en filreferanse til manifestfilen, basert på det angitte elementet.

trans-unit.source: The item from which to create the file reference to add to the manifest.
trans-unit.target: Element å opprette filreferansen å legge til i manifestet.

trans-unit.source: The file reference that was added to the manifest.
trans-unit.target: Filreferansen som ble lagt til i manifestet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the assembly version.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir samlingsversjonen.

trans-unit.source: The assembly version.
trans-unit.target: Samlingsversjonen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the manifest description text.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir manifest beskrivelsesteksten.

trans-unit.source: The manifest description text.
trans-unit.target: Manifest beskrivelsesteksten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the managed assembly or ClickOnce manifest reference that is the entry point to the manifest.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir forvaltet samling eller ClickOnce manifest referanse som inngangspunkt til manifestet.

trans-unit.source: The managed assembly or ClickOnce manifest reference that is the entry point to the application.
trans-unit.target: Forvaltet samling eller ClickOnce manifest referanse som inngangspunktet til programmet.

trans-unit.source: Executes the `GenerateManifestBase` task.
trans-unit.target: Utfører de `GenerateManifestBase` oppgaven.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if task execution succeeded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kjøring av oppgaven var vellykket; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the manifest file reference that matches the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer manifestfilen referansen som samsvarer med det angitte elementet.

trans-unit.source: If the file reference does not exist in the manifest for the specified item, then this method adds a file reference for this item.
trans-unit.target: Hvis filreferansen ikke finnes i manifestet for det angitte elementet, legger denne metoden en filreferanse for dette elementet.

trans-unit.source: The item to get a file reference for.
trans-unit.target: Element for å hente en filreferanse for.

trans-unit.source: The manifest file reference that matches the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Manifestfilen referansen som samsvarer med det angitte elementet.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, returns the type of the manifest.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer typen for manifestfilen når implementert i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The manifest type.
trans-unit.target: Manifest typen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the input manifest.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir inndata manifestet.

trans-unit.source: The input manifest.
trans-unit.target: Inndata manifestet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum manifest file name length.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den maksimale manifestfil lengden.

trans-unit.source: The maximum manifest file name length.
trans-unit.target: Navnelengde for maksimal manifestfilen.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, sets manifest properties and any dependencies.
trans-unit.target: Når implementert i en avledet klasse, manifest angir egenskaper og avhengigheter.

trans-unit.source: The manifest to set properties for.
trans-unit.target: Manifestfilen angi egenskaper for.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if no errors occurred when the manifest properties are set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis ingen feil oppstod under manifest egenskapene er angitt; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, sets resolved manifest properties.
trans-unit.target: Når implementert i en avledet klasse, løse angir manifest egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: For example, resolved manifest properties are the publisher and product.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel er løst manifest utgiveren og produktet.

trans-unit.source: The manifest to set properties for.
trans-unit.target: Manifestfilen angi egenskaper for.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if no errors occurred when the manifest properties are set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis ingen feil oppstod under manifest egenskapene er angitt; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the generated manifest.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir genererte manifestet.

trans-unit.source: The generated manifest.
trans-unit.target: Genererte manifestet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the manifest platform.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir manifest plattformen.

trans-unit.source: The manifest platform can have one of the following values: `x86`, `x64`, `Itanium`, or `AnyCPU`.
trans-unit.target: Manifest plattformen kan ha én av følgende verdier: `x86`, `x64`, `Itanium`, eller `AnyCPU`.

trans-unit.source: The manifest platform.
trans-unit.target: Manifest plattformen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the manifest target culture code.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir manifest target kultur koden.

trans-unit.source: Valid values for the target culture are any valid values for <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>, and also "neutral" or "*" for neutral cultures.
trans-unit.target: Gyldige verdier for kulturen mål er gyldige verdier for <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>, og også "nøytral" eller "*" for nøytral kulturer.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The manifest target culture code.
trans-unit.target: Manifest target kultur koden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the target framework moniker.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir target framework kallenavn.

trans-unit.source: Returns the target framework moniker.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer target framework kallenavn.

trans-unit.source: The target [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] version for the project.
trans-unit.target: Målet [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] versjon for prosjektet.

trans-unit.source: The default value is empty, which means there is no filtering for the references based on the target framework.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er tom, filtrering ikke brukes for referansene basert på framework mål.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] version.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] versjon.

trans-unit.source: Validates the inputs of the `GenerateManifestBase` task.
trans-unit.target: Validerer inndata for den `GenerateManifestBase` oppgaven.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if input validation succeeded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis inndata valideringen var vellykket; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Validates the generated manifest.
trans-unit.target: Validerer genererte manifestet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if manifest validation succeeded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis manifest valideringen var vellykket; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
